title: Consolidated Balance Sheets - USD ($)$ in Millions

Current assets:.label: Cash and cash equivalents
Current assets:.definition: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

Current assets:.label: Short-term investments
Current assets:.definition: Amount of investments including trading securities, available-for-sale securities, held-to-maturity securities, and short-term investments classified as other and current.

Current assets:.label: Merchandise inventory – net
Current assets:.definition: Amount after valuation and LIFO reserves of inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

Current assets:.label: Other current assets
Current assets:.definition: Amount of current assets classified as other.

Current assets:.label: Total current assets
Current assets:.definition: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are expected to be realized in cash, sold, or consumed within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

Current assets:.label: Property, less accumulated depreciation
Current assets:.definition: Amount, after accumulated depreciation and amortization, of property, plant, and equipment and finance lease right-of-use asset.

Current assets:.label: Operating lease right-of-use assets
Current assets:.definition: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

Current assets:.label: Long-term investments
Current assets:.definition: The total amount of investments that are intended to be held for an extended period of time (longer than one operating cycle).

Current assets:.label: Deferred income taxes – net
Current assets:.definition: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting.

Current assets:.label: Other assets
Current assets:.definition: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.

Current assets:.label: Total assets
Current assets:.definition: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

Current liabilities:.label: Short-term borrowings
Current liabilities:.definition: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

Current liabilities:.label: Current maturities of long-term debt
Current liabilities:.definition: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, classified as current.

Current liabilities:.label: Current operating lease liabilities
Current liabilities:.definition: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as current.

Current liabilities:.label: Accounts payable
Current liabilities:.definition: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

Current liabilities:.label: Accrued compensation and employee benefits
Current liabilities:.definition: Total of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for obligations related to services received from employees, such as accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

Current liabilities:.label: Deferred revenue
Current liabilities:.definition: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

Current liabilities:.label: Income taxes payable
Current liabilities:.definition: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all currently due domestic and foreign income tax obligations.

Current liabilities:.label: Other current liabilities
Current liabilities:.definition: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

Current liabilities:.label: Total current liabilities
Current liabilities:.definition: Total obligations incurred as part of normal operations that are expected to be paid during the following twelve months or within one business cycle, if longer.

Current liabilities:.label: Long-term debt, excluding current maturities
Current liabilities:.definition: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, classified as noncurrent.

Current liabilities:.label: Noncurrent operating lease liabilities
Current liabilities:.definition: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as noncurrent.

Current liabilities:.label: Deferred revenue – Lowe’s protection plans
Current liabilities:.definition: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as noncurrent.

Current liabilities:.label: Other liabilities
Current liabilities:.definition: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

Current liabilities:.label: Total liabilities
Current liabilities:.definition: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

Shareholders’ deficit:.label: Preferred stock – $5 par value: Authorized – 5.0 million shares; Issued and outstanding – none
Shareholders’ deficit:.definition: Value of all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by shareholders, which is net of related treasury stock. May be all or a portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. These shares represent the ownership interest of the preferred shareholders.

Shareholders’ deficit:.label: Common stock – $0.50 par value: Authorized – 5.6 billion shares; Issued and outstanding – 574 million and 601 million, respectively
Shareholders’ deficit:.definition: Value of all classes of common stock held by shareholders. May be all or portion of the number of common shares authorized. These shares exclude common shares repurchased by the entity and held as treasury shares.

Shareholders’ deficit:.label: Accumulated other comprehensive income
Shareholders’ deficit:.definition: Amount, after tax, of accumulated increase (decrease) in equity from transaction and other event and circumstance from nonowner source.

Shareholders’ deficit:.label: Total shareholders’ deficit
Shareholders’ deficit:.definition: Amount of equity (deficit) attributable to parent. Excludes temporary equity and equity attributable to noncontrolling interest.

Shareholders’ deficit:.label: Total liabilities and shareholders’ deficit
Shareholders’ deficit:.definition: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.
